sentences.english: I should never have trusted him.
sentences.chinese: 我原先就不应该那么信任他。

sentences.english: A partition surfaced in foil wall covering stands in lieu of a headboard.
sentences.chinese: 一面金属箔片饰面的隔墙替代了床头板原先的位置。

sentences.english: Chlamydomonas divides frequently and forms two individuals where before there was one.
sentences.chinese: 衣藻经常分裂，原先为一个而分为两个个体。

sentences.english: "This all used to be ice ten years ago, " Jia Son says, as he scrambles across the scree and brush.
sentences.chinese: 十年前，这里原先都是冰层。

sentences.english: The original smile, then full of scars.
sentences.chinese: 原先笑靥如花，后来满是伤疤。

sentences.english: For years, Spindler survived mostly off savings from his consulting work.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，他主要依靠原先做咨询工作时的积蓄过日子。

sentences.english: The consequences of your actions end up being more than you had bargained for.
sentences.chinese: 行为后果超出了原先的考虑。

sentences.english: Emma saw its artifice, and returned to her first surmises.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛看穿了她的伎俩，又回到了原先的猜疑上。

sentences.english: Originally the Noe bags carried 5 bottles of champagne.
sentences.chinese: 原先诺埃袋可以装5瓶香槟。

sentences.english: I was much happier in my old job.
sentences.chinese: 我做我原先的那份工作要带劲得多。

sentences.english: Little of the original architecture remains .
sentences.chinese: 原先的建筑物几乎片瓦不留。

sentences.english: My loud old air-conditioner is very useful for this exercise.
sentences.chinese: 我原先那个老空调的声音倒是对我很有效。

sentences.english: I've got the feeling that the old Ottmar is back.
sentences.chinese: 我感到原先的那个奥特马回来了。

sentences.english: The village was originally surrounded by trees of which none remain now.
sentences.chinese: 原先村子四周都是树，现在这些树都不见了。

sentences.english: And you do not wish me to go away without fulfilling your original intentions?
sentences.chinese: 您愿不愿意我在还没了却您原先的心愿以前就离开？

sentences.english: I wonder if we could revert to what you were saying earlier.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们是否可以重新考虑一下你原先所说的。

definition: original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
to turn to (sth else)/to switch to
to convert/to turn into (sth else)/to adapt (a story to another medium)
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
